question: Which country's large-scale capital development project is "New Administrative Capital"?
explanation: New Administrative Capital is a large-scale capital development and expansion project of Egypt that has been under progress since 2015. This project was conceptualised and declared at the Egypt Economic Development Conference in 2015. The main reason projected behind the declaration of this project was to relieve the congestion and population pressure of Cairo city. As per the plan, this city will become the new administrative and financial capital of Egypt, once completed. The city will reportedly be named as "Wedian".
